Constant std::env::consts::EXE_SUFFIX

pub const EXE_SUFFIX: &str;

Specifies the filename suffix used for executable binaries on this platform. Example value is .exe.

Some possible values:

  • .exe
  • .nexe
  • .pexe
  • "" (an empty string)
